Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Northbound Reroute near 132nd/Langley
ShortDescription: NB 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Langley, 131st, Ellis, 130th, Eberhart, due to, street blockage, near 132nd/Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Langley, 131st, Ellis, 130th, and Eberhart, due to, street blockage, near 132nd/Langley.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Reroute near Northwest Highway/Ozanan
ShortDescription: 68 NW Highwy buses temp.rerouted NB: NW Highwy, Ozark, Olmstead; SB: NW Highwy, Washington, Summit, Ozark, NW Highwy, near Northwest Highwy/Ozanan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage, near Northwest Highwy/Ozanan.

Northbound buses will operate via: Northwest Highway, Ozark, Olmstead.

Southbound buses will operate via: Northwest Highway, Washington, Summit, Ozark, Northwest Highway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Merchandise Mart and the Loop
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Merchandise Mart and the Loop due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Merchandise Mart and the Loop due to a mechanical problem.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kimball and Merchanise Mart at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Merchandise Mart and the Loop to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
